name: Supertrumpman: Patriot Fists of Truth
summary: A fast reaction survival defense game in which you play as the 44th President of the United States defending the White House (on the moon) against the nightmarish hordes from beyond the wall. Fast moving hordes upon hordes of various enemies storm towards you from multiple directions. You shoot them down by pressing fire buttons according to direction of attack. As you clear waves and defeat boss enemies, you gain power levels and can buy upgrades.
